Detailed Description

The StereoCameraParameters holds the intrinsic and extrinsic parameters of the camera system.

Member Data Documentation

DepthSense::ExtrinsicParameters DepthSense::StereoCameraParameters::extrinsics

The coordinate system used is the one specified through DepthNode::coordinateSystemType property.
